name: NewOrleansSaintsFlashNewsBrief
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Just add the New Orleans Saints Flash News Brief skill to your Alexa device. Then the next time you ask Alexa for your news, Saints News direct from the New Orleans Saints will be played with the rest of your news!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
